name: Clones (itch) (ZiyadCodes)
description:
Hello, this is my second game jam (My first one was Keep The Rope) I made this game using C++ and the library SFML which I learned one week before the start of the jam and I also got distracted by lots of things while making the game, so I couldn't finish the story thing, so I'll type it here.

STORY: 

We were in our class and everyone was saying what they would like to be when they grow up. Then our teacher said that we are clones. We were all confused at first. Then she said that a clone is a person who doesn't get to work or do anything dangerous. Because when the person that they are a clone of gets badly injured that clones body parts get used to help the injured person. And the clone is left to die. I didn't really understand anything at that time but I understand now. I was walking with my friends in the clones park. Then we found a doctor, he had a syringe gun in his hand and he tried to shoot me, but thankfully he missed and now

 I need you to get me as fast as possible to the CBunker.  It should take me 200 seconds to reach it.

In there all of the chased clones hide, and if they are seen out of that bunker they are instantly killed
